description: Request parameters for updating campaign and package settings

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference for the media buy to update

end_time.description: New end date/time in ISO 8601 format

media_buy_id.description: Publisher's ID of the media buy to update

bid_price.description: Updated bid price for auction-based pricing options (only applies when pricing_option is auction-based)

budget.description: Updated budget allocation for this package in the currency specified by the pricing option

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference for the package to update

creative_assignments.description: Full creative assignment objects with weights and placement targeting (alternative to creative_ids - provides granular control over weights and placement targeting). Uses replacement semantics like creative_ids.

creative_ids.description: Update creative assignments (references existing library creatives)

creatives.description: Full creative objects to upload and assign to this package (alternative to creative_ids - creatives will be added to library). Supports both static and generative creatives.

package_id.description: Publisher's ID of package to update

paused.description: Pause/resume specific package (true = paused, false = active)
Pause/resume the entire media buy (true = paused, false = active)

push_notification_config.description: Optional webhook configuration for async update notifications. Publisher will send webhook when update completes if operation takes longer than immediate response time.

title: Update Media Buy Request
